com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.widget

Class PopScrollView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • PopScrollView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView

    public abstract class PopScrollView
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Created by swallow on 2015/8/13. Here is how our PopView constructed. PopView is a ScrollView, including a LinearLayout child, which is composed with some rectangle views, such as TextViews. Version 2.0 is developed from 2015/1/14. I am ready for an API, related to customize PopItem and PopItemDetail

    • Constructor Detail

      • PopScrollView

        public PopScrollView(android.content.Context context)

      • PopScrollView

        public PopScrollView(android.content.Context context,
                     android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        Initialize parameters. Three Task will be initialize as well. 1. checkFinalItemStateTask : Which will be used for check whether all player item is prepared. 2. checkInitialItemStateTask : Which will be used for check whether first item is ready. 3. checkMainThreadStateTask : Which will be used for check main thread is busy or not.
        Parameters:
        context -
        attrs -

    • Method Detail

      • moveToPosition

        public void moveToPosition(int position)

      • setCurrentFocusedPosition

        public void setCurrentFocusedPosition(int newPosition)
        The method is used for setting current focused position based on scrollbar's position. Normally, the item in the middle should be focused and the color will be orange.

      • showItemDetails

        public void showItemDetails()
        showItemDetails shows the detail of each item it will do the following thing 1. Add a new faked layout (fakedLinearLayout) which size is the same with ZoomIn item (Immediately) and make the faked layout stretch to the larger size slowly (0.5s) 2. Show the detail content of word (0.3s)

      • hideItemDetails

        public void hideItemDetails()
        hideItemDetails shows the detail of each item it will do the following thing 1. Make the detail's content disappear slowly (0.3s) 2. Make faked layout (fakedLinearLayout) ZoomOut and disappear (0.5s) 3. Change Color and show the detail content of word (0.3s)
